name: Notion Ultimate Budget Tracker
description: Make smart financial decisions with the Notion Budget Tracker.The Notion Budget Tracker template helps individuals and business people have a much better overview of expenses. With the Notion Budget Tracker, you will avoid overspending.This tool simplifies money management, helping you track spending and save efficiently. Embrace a new level of financial confidence and organization.Features:Choose any currencyKeep track of your expenses in one place.Actual cost is a sum of all your expenses in e
features: Choose any currency; Keep track of your expenses in one place.; Actual cost is a sum of all your expenses in each category; Automatically calculations; Organize your expenses by category; Monthly and yearly overviews of your expenses; Access your budget tracker from any device, anywhere
